isis.stitle: 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS INTERNATIONAL MODEL ES52-7A AND ESO65-7A 6-PLUS - REASSEMBLY - SHIFT KNOB INSTALLATION

svcproc.title: SHIFT KNOB INSTALLATION
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 102, shift knob installation.

step1.para: Install the .875" dia. roll pin into the hole in the shift lever so that approximately 1/8" of roll pin sticks out on each side of the lever.

Place the shift knob onto the lever so that the roll pin fits into the slots on the shift knob. Please remember that the part number and the external boss on the tower casting are on the passenger side of the vehicle.
Place the flat washer and then the lock washer over the threaded portion of the shift lever.
Install the nut and torque to 79-90 in-lb. DO NOT OVER TORQUE NUT.
Check to see that knob is tight by twisting assembly.

Install the bezel into the knob assembly. Care must be taken during assembly so that the paint on the back is not scraped off. Installation of the bezel is best performed with your hands by first placing the front or large side of the bezel into the knob. Next push forward and down until the bezel snaps into place.
